name.name: name
name.label: Name
name.default:
lowercase label and replace spaces with '_'

no label -> name is generated i.e. 'f1'
name.description: This value is is the variable name used

label.name: label
label.label: Label
label.description:
This is the label displayed for the field, if you want to hide the label then set this to false

The string can also contain mustache i.e.
'My choice {{value}}'

value.name: value
value.label: Value
value.description: Function will run once at instantiation

help.name: help
help.label: Help
help.description: This text is used to provide context or help in filling out the field

placeholder.name: placeholder
placeholder.label: Placeholder
placeholder.description: This text will be visible in the text box until text is entered into the field

limit.name: limit
limit.label: Limit
limit.description: This is used to set the maxLength property and limits the number of characters that can be entered.

columns.name: columns
columns.label: Columns
columns.description: The form is divided into a grid 12 columns wide, this is setting how many of those columns to display this element at, using this you can make milti-column forms

target.name: target
target.label: Target
target.description: If the target is not set then the field is appended to the parent element which is usually the main form but may be a fieldset

array.name: array
array.label: Array
array.description: if set to true or and object then this field will have buttons for adding and removing instances of the item. Additionally the value will become an array of all instances of this field. Further information on this can be found here.

display.name: display
display.label: Display
display.description: This option controls whether this field should be visible to the user, allowing for fields to only be used if certain conditions are met

enable.name: enable
enable.label: Enable
enable.description: Similar to display but this option controls whether the field is enabled for interaction

parse.name: parse
parse.label: Parse
parse.description: This option determins if the field will be in the data result from myform.get()

validate.name: validate
validate.label: Validate
validate.description: This is a set of validations to perform on this field when validate() is called. Note: fields that are empty are not validated, if you require something to be filled in use the required attribute

required.name: required
required.label: Required
required.description: This is a special case for validation that is calculated live and updates the label to indicate the required status. Validation of this happens when validate() is called
